sect3.title: Continue Without Boot Loader
sect3.para: This option can be used to provide bootable system even when no boot loader is to be installed, either because the arch/subarch doesn't provide one, or because none is desired (e.g. you will use existing boot loader). This option is especially useful for Macintosh, Atari, and Amiga systems, where the original OS must be maintained on the box and used to boot GNU/Linux.
